reviewText: My daughter just recently got into hello kitty so she loves it. However, the voices are not the same as the Growing Up With Hello Kitty 1 and 2. They have puzzle games after each episode too. Great if your child likes to learn. Still has good morals though.
My girls love Hello Kitty and watch these movies over and over again.  We love this collection and would recommend it.

The videos arrived promptly and were in great condition. However, the episode about the storybook adventure where the nice lady turns mean is not appropriate for young children. This also goes for the episode about the dust monster on volume 2. It scares my 2 year-old.

But these episodes are easily skipped.
